fields.description: Titanium.UI constants TEXT_VERTICAL_ALIGNMENT_TOP please investigate the failure. Please use https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/tree/TIMOB-24816 to find the related testYou can use https://github.com/ewanharris/mocha-test to quickly debug (most) mocha tests)

comments.body: Error is originating from here https://github.com/ewanharris/titanium-mobile-mocha-suite/blob/TIMOB-24816/Resources/utilities/assertions.js#L31 this.fail logs undefined so I'm not sure what's correct here, need to investigate iOS and Android
